You are given a number N. You have to make a Nâˆ—N matrix and store the values in the matrix by finding a pattern using the following examples: Input:- N=1 Matrix = [1] Input:- N=2 Matrix = [

                    1   3
                  6  10 ]
Input:- N=3 Matrix = [

                  1   3  10
                  6  15  28
                 21  36   45]
Input:- N=4 Matrix = [

             1   3   10    28
             6   15   36   66

              21  45   78    105

              55   91  120     136]
Input format The first line of the input contains an integer T denoting the number of test cases. For each test case an integer N is provided. Output format For each test case print the matrix in the new line.

Input Format

2

2

3

Constraints

1<=T<=15 , 1<=N<=10^2

Output Format

1 3

6 10

1 3 10

6 15 28

21 36 45

Sample Input 0

1
50
Sample Output 0

1 3 10 28 66 136 253 435 703 1081 1596 2278 3160 4278 5671 7381 9453 11935 14878 18336 22366 27028 32385 38503 45451 53301 62128 72010 83028 95266 108811 123753 140185 158203 177906 199396 222778 248160 275653 305371 337431 371953 409060 448878 491536 537166 585903 637885 693253 752151 
6 15 36 78 153 276 465 741 1128 1653 2346 3240 4371 5778 7503 9591 12090 15051 18528 22578 27261 32640 38781 45753 53628 62481 72390 83436 95703 109278 124251 140715 158766 178503 200028 223446 248865 276396 306153 338253 372816 409965 449826 492528 538203 586986 639015 694431 753378 814726 
21 45 91 171 300 496 780 1176 1711 2415 3321 4465 5886 7626 9730 12246 15225 18721 22791 27495 32896 39060 46056 53956 62835 72771 83845 96141 109746 124750 141246 159330 179101 200661 224115 249571 277140 306936 339076 373680 410871 450775 493521 539241 588070 640146 695610 754606 816003 878475

94830 107880 122265 138075 155403 174345 195000 217470 241860 268278 296835 327645 360825 396495 434778 475800 519690 566580 616605 669903 726615 786885 849556 913276 977901 1043290 1109305 1175811 1242676 1309771 1376970 1444150 1511191 1577976 1644391 1710325 1775670 1840321 1904176 1967136 2029105 2089990 2149701 2208151 2265256 2320935 2375110 2427706 2478651 2527876 
108345 122760 138601 155961 174936 195625 218130 242556 269011 297606 328455 361675 397386 435711 476776 520710 567645 617716 671061 727821 788140 850860 914628 979300 1044735 1110795 1177345 1244253 1311390 1378630 1445850 1512930 1579753 1646205 1712175 1777555 1842240 1906128 1969120 2031120 2092035 2151775 2210253 2267385 2323090 2377290 2429910 2480878 2530125 2577585 
12325


























def generate_matrix(N):
    matrix = []
    current_number = 1
    for i in range(N):
        row = []
        for j in range(N):
            row.append(current_number)
            current_number += (i * N + j + 2)
        matrix.append(row)
    return matrix

def print_matrix(matrix):
    for row in matrix:
        print(' '.join(map(str, row)))

# Input for the size of the matrix
N = int(input("Enter the size of the matrix (N): "))
matrix = generate_matrix(N)
print_matrix(matrix)
